feed.title: Paperless-AI Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v2.1.5
entry.content:
https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/commit/87c75f34dadd8c5d1bf5cb56013f04277604a4f5

Paperless-ai now also processes documents without owner rights, as this is indeed possible.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v2.1.4...v2.1.5

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v2.1.8
entry.content:
Fixed https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/118

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v2.1.7...v2.1.8

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v2.1.9
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v2.1.8...v2.1.9

Added a new Settings option: Brought back num_ctx (100000) for Ollama.

"Use existing Correspondents and Tags".

If you choose yes, all your tags and correspondents will be added to the prompt for later data matching and providing better consistent results. BUT it will increase your token length and will be costlier and for Ollama much more possible to run into issues. When you have many preexisting data it will be somtimes the case that the prompt only consists of your data and nothing more. So pay attention!
